sentences.en: For example, you could list your records in your report alphabetically.
sentences.cn: 例如，可以在报告中按字母顺序列出记录。

sentences.en: I alphabetically aligned my books on the book shelf.
sentences.cn: 我把书按照字母表顺序排列在书架上.

sentences.en: I've arranged the books alphabetically so don't muddle them up.
sentences.cn: 我已按字母顺序把这些书整理了,千万不要再弄乱.
咱们把名字按字母顺序归类.

sentences.en: Most books were arranged wholly artificially, often alphabetically.
sentences.cn: 多数的书全是人为排列, 往往按字母顺序排.

sentences.en: Provides lists of compiler options, organized alphabetically or by purpose.
sentences.cn: 提供按字母顺序或按用途排列的编译器选项列表.

sentences.en: References should be listed alphabetically author at the end of the manuscript.
sentences.cn: 参考文献必须以字母顺序排列,置于文稿末尾.

sentences.en: She listed the states alphabetically but California was out of order.
sentences.cn: 她按字母顺序把各州排列出来,但加利福尼亚却排错了顺序.

sentences.en: Some options led to a second list of recipes organized alphabetically or by most recent entry.
sentences.cn: 一些选项指向按字母顺序或者按最近访问组织的另一个菜谱列表。

sentences.en: Sort items alphabetically or display them in a custom order.
sentences.cn: 按字母顺序对项排序或以自定义顺序显示它们.

sentences.en: Sorting options to sort your image list alphabetically, ascending or descending.
sentences.cn: 排序选项排序您的形象名单按字母顺序, 升序或降序.

sentences.en: Sorts items alphabetically by name of the folder they are in.
sentences.cn: 将项目按其所在文件夹的字母顺序排列.
这些书是按字母顺序编入目录的.

sentences.en: The catalog is organized alphabetically by label name.
sentences.cn: 这个目录按标签名的字母顺序排列而成。

sentences.en: The names are listed alphabetically with the last or surname first.
sentences.cn: 地址和电话号码.姓名是姓在前,名在后,按英文字母的顺序排列.

sentences.en: These cards are arranged alphaBetically under Both author and title.
sentences.cn: 这些卡片是按照作者和书名的字母顺序排列的.

sentences.en: They are all filed alphabetically under author.
sentences.cn: 这些都是按照作者姓名的字母顺序归档的。

sentences.en: You can sort the rows within a table of data according to the data type, allowing you to order by figures — alphabetically and by date.
sentences.cn: 您还可以根据数据类型对数据表格中的行进行排序，这样便可以按数字、字母和日期进行排序。

words.tran_cn: 字母的；[计] 依字母顺序的
希腊字母的第一个字母；开端；最初
字母表，字母系统；入门，初步
按照字母顺序排列；拼音化
依字母顺序排列；用字母表示；拼音化
